line_1: And from this simile a hint
line_2: To mark each varied form and tint;

line_1: And now my fears would often hint
line_2: And wiser 'twere our trust to stint,

line_1: As more in sorrow than in anger, hint
line_2: Some of my Friends (so lavishly I print)

line_1: On these each coffee-house will lend a hint,
line_2: Besides a thousand things that are in print.

line_1: Would you think, my dear Mother, (without the least Hint
line_2: That we all should be glad of appearing in Print)

line_1: And, cntre nous, if I may hint
line_2: What may be each day read in print,
